itemDescription: English rugby league footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Ernest "Ernie" J. Ashcroft (28 February 1925 – May 1985) was an English professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s, 1950s and 1960s, and coached in the 1950s and 1960s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, England, British Empire XIII and Lancashire, and at club level for Wigan (Heritage № 465), and Huddersfield, as a fullback, wing, or centre, i.e. number 1, 2 or 5, or, 3 or 4, and coached at club level for Huddersfield and Warrington.
